summary: Makes animals and creatures more dangerous
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------
More Dangerous Creatures
----------------------------------------------
I know there are plenty of mods on the Nexus that make creatures harder to kill and more dangerous. I found that non of them suited my own play style. I made this for myself but I decided I would share it in case anyone else was looking for something similar.

----------------------------------------------
What it does
----------------------------------------------
This increases the damage that most animals and creatures do, but decreases their health. If you are caught off guard creatures you can be easily overwhelmed. If you are ready you can easily dispatch whatever comes at you but if you are not even a lowly pack of wolves could pose a serious threat.

I haven\'t had a chance to test out my changes entirely yet so let me know if you have any suggestions for balancing or otherwise.

----------------------------------------------
Install
----------------------------------------------
Just activate the esp. 

----------------------------------------------
Change Log
----------------------------------------------
- V 0.1
   -Prey animals will avoid roads
   -Wolves, sabercats and bears (Oh my!) now have less health but do more damage
   -Trolls now do more damage  
   -Trolls now have a higher regen rate
   -Trolls have greater weakness to fire
   -Snow Trolls have a greater resistance to frost
   -Experimental skill increases of skeleton skills in order to increase damage
   -Added knockdowns to power attacks for some creatures

----------------------------------------------
Plans
----------------------------------------------
- Increased spawns
- Better balancing
- Increased movement speed of some creatures
- DLC integration
- Possible compatibility with Realistic Animals and Predators
- Possible compatibility with Real Wildlife

----------------------------------------------
Compatibility
----------------------------------------------
Probably not compatible with anything that modifies animals or creatures

----------------------------------------------
Credits
----------------------------------------------
Me
etayorius (for inspiring me with his Realistic Animals and Predators mod)
Nedius (for inspiring me with his Real Wildlife mod)
Netflix for giving me something to watch while I work
Bethesda and all that other stuff that people normally plop at the bottom of their credit section
author: McHydesinyourpants
